project.name: yocto-render
project.description: render utility for yocto core stack

Render.name: Render
Render.description:
Yocto render manager. Manage your own render request

A custom render wrapper to display default template value for a website

For more details on these dependencies read links below :
- LodAsh : https://lodash.com/
- uuid : https://www.npmjs.com/package/uuid
- yocto-logger : git+ssh://lab.yocto.digital/yocto-node-modules/yocto-render.git
- yocto-utils :  git+ssh://lab.yocto.digital/yocto-node-modules/yocto-utils.git
- joi : https://github.com/hapijs/joi

For each examples, please read file on example directory.
Render.author: : Mathieu ROBERT <mathieu@yocto.re>

classitems.description: Config object. a clone value of defaultConfig or customized by user
classitems.name: config

classitems.description: Debug state property. if false debug mode is disabled
classitems.name: debug

classitems.description:
Login property. By Default Render use his logger instance.
But we can set this value by a already yocto-logger instance

params.name: reference
params.description: reference object to use

params.name: destination
params.description: array to store data before parse

params.name: keyLabel
params.description: main label to use on template

params.name: valueLabel
params.description: second label to use on template

params.name: type
params.description: to use on parse

classitems.description: Build simple key association for template

classitems.description: Build data to inject on header page
classitems.name: buildHeader

classitems.description: Main rendering function. Render tempate or only data

params.name: template,
params.description: current template path to display by rendered

params.name: param,
params.description: current custom param to send on rendering

params.name: nocache,
params.description: true if we need to use no cache header, false otherwise

params.name: onlydata,
params.description: true if we need to send only data

params.name: data,
params.description: object to send if we need only data. By default we need to use this param if we set onlydata param to true

classitems.description: Default render function. for template rendering
classitems.name: render

params.description: http response object

params.description: template name/path to use for display

params.description: data to display

params.description: true if we need no cache header, false otherwise
